1:
CIRCULAR  NO   01/2002 
 
 
Sub: - Intimation to R&AW Control Room on incident of 
hijacking of aircraft 
 
While the R&AW Control Room has been included in the list of those who 
are to be immediately informed of the hijacking in para 2.2.1 of the Contingency 
Plan which is pending approval of the Government, in view of the prevailing 
adverse security scenario, it has been decided that air traffic control officer and 
flight information centre Delhi shall intimate to the R&AW Control Room on any 
incident of hijacking of aircraft on the following telephone numbers which shall be 
kept secret: 
 
Telephone Number  
4365379 
Fax Number  
 
2404 
 
(R.K. Singh) 
Addl  Commissioner  of  Security (CA) 
 
Case NO.CAS-5(1)2001-DIV-1 Date   07 .01.2002
